system.description:
Creates a bolt of lightning that begins up to 180' away from the caster and extends 60' further in a straight line. All creatures within the area of effect take 6d6 points of lightning damage. Each creature in the path of the bolt may make a saving throw vs. spells for half damage.

Special Effect: If the bolt strikes a solid surface, it bounces back toward the caster until it reaches its full length of 60'.
